SummaryEnglish: Shasha and Milo are the newly activated Crescent Moon Guardians. Imbued with the power to transform between human, cat and a formidable hybrid form, Shasha and Milo are tasked with protecting Crescent Island from the dark forces that lurk beneath itâ€¦ whilst navigating the daily complexities of preteen life.

1.SummaryEnglish: Shasha wants to experience all the human world has to offer; unfortunately, her curiosity also unleashes an ancient army of Krystal Warriors.

2.SummaryEnglish: Shasha, in cat form, is snatched by a gigantic cat-obsessed Krystal Warrior and imprisoned; to break her free, Milo needs to learn how to be the perfect cat.

3.SummaryEnglish: After a stinky lunchbox incident, Shasha feels like an outsider in the human world until she finds a kindred spirit in Frankencat.

4.TitleEnglish: All The Fun Of The Fair
4.SummaryEnglish: When Milo wins tickets for the grand re-opening of the Crescent Island Fair, his plans for highly organized fun are thrown off course.

5.SummaryEnglish: Perennial underdog Bong Bong steps up to be the hero of the hour.

6.SummaryEnglish: Milo is looking forward to spending some quality time with Uncle Leo without Shasha.

7.SummaryEnglish: Milo decides to reinvent himself as the cool new 'cat' in town at an annual 'Cats Only' festival.

8.SummaryEnglish: The Guardians get a chaotic crash course in drama at the school production of 'Cinderkatz' when Shasha is cast in the lead role. Our duo's secret identity is threatened by the minions tracking them to Crescent Island school.

9.TitleEnglish: Krystals Are a Cat's Best Friend
9.SummaryEnglish: Milo's urge to act more instinctively whilst trying to stop a heist at the museum, leads to the Guardians being identified as criminals. Jack unknowingly joins the minions and the whole city faces a super-charged threat.

10.TitleEnglish: A Day in the Life of Bong-Bong
10.SummaryEnglish: Shasha gets her wish to live a dog's life like Bong Bong when struck by a body swap device. She learns living as a dog isn't as easy as bones, barking and 'Bong Bonging' about. The minions on her tail she needs her body back.

11.SummaryEnglish: Milo is determined to win Crescent Island's pumped-up, wrestling themed baking competition, but he faces strong competition from Sundae and Kat, plus an unintended invasion of tiny sugar-crazed Krystal Warriors.

12.SummaryEnglish: When everyone else gets their memories erased by Sundae's latest gadget, it falls to Shasha to save a dangerously chilled-out Milo by reminding him who he really is, whilst stuck with "nice" Heather as her new sidekick.

13.SummaryEnglish: When everyone else gets their memories erased by Sundae's latest gadget, it falls to Shasha to save a dangerously chilled-out Milo by reminding him who he really is, whilst stuck with "nice" Heather as her new sidekick.

14.SummaryEnglish: Izzy tries to update the ancient 'Sagas of the Guardians' with Shasha and Milo's heroic origin story and does a deep dive into how they met, but they have very different memories of that day and their first tenuous steps as Guardians.

15.SummaryEnglish: Cat Shasha needs her own space and finds it in the unexpected lap of Heather. Her new luxury lifestyle comes unstuck when she's targeted by Luca's minions, armed with Krystal Warriors powered by the 'feralness' of domestic cats.

16.TitleEnglish: Romeo and the Helmet of Destiny
16.SummaryEnglish: The Guardians get heroic help from Romeo when he is chosen as the 'owner' of an ancient talking suit of armour. Unfortunately, the armour takes control and threatens to bring down the Guardians. Only Romeo's big mouth can save the day.

17.SummaryEnglish: Milo's attempts to find a new friend for Leo, in the form of Principal Lee, leads to farcical chaos at the bowling alley and Heather being kidnapped by Symon and a suspicious Vera who is convinced Heather is one of the Guardians.

18.SummaryEnglish: Heroes and villains are forced to work together when Beta, Luca's artificially intelligent Krystal Warrior, concludes the best way to make the Island 'perfect' is to freeze everyone and everything on it in Krystal - forever.

19.SummaryEnglish: Shasha takes a break from the human world and returns 'home' to find a new mysterious kitten has taken her place in Yuna's heart. But is this kitten all it seems? Meanwhile Luca leaves Kat in charge for a day leading to a minion uprising.

20.SummaryEnglish: A Guardian themed convention goes awry when Sundae unleashes her newest invention, the fear glove. Only our heroes literally facing their fears will help them win the day, and stop an outbreak of scary cucumbers and giant fleas.

21.SummaryEnglish: Spotting an opportunity during a rare power sapping eclipse of the moon, the Guardians decide to raid Luca's lair. Unfortunately, Luca isn't the only one whose powers are offline as the Guardians find themselves stuck in their human form.

22.SummaryEnglish: Milo's undiscovered singing talent threatens to enrapture the whole island when Luca uses it to turn all humans into cat obsessed drones. Can Shasha save Milo from evil pop stardom, and win the ultimate musical showdown?

23.SummaryEnglish: Frankencat is back, as put-upon sidekick to a manipulative hero, Clint Stallion. Shasha and Milo join forces with shifty Clint to 'protect' Frankencat, but end up in the gladiator ring against their enraged old 'Franken-friend'.

24.SummaryEnglish: Uncle Leo's secret life is revealed, and Milo feels betrayed. Milo must take a literal leap of faith to reconcile with Leo and stop Luca from destroying the Guardians, but in doing so uncovers an even bigger secret that changes everything.

25.SummaryEnglish: Shasha and Milo face off when Milo accepts a deal with Luca to get answers about the Guardians' past. Luca unleashes a cat conversion ray on the humans of Crescent Island and the Guardians' loyalties are tested to breaking point in a final battle.
